name: messageformat
description: PluralFormat and SelectFormat Message and i18n Tool - A JavaScript Implemenation of the ICU standards.
author: Alex Sexton <alexsexton@gmail.com>

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:example && npm run build:docs
scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:minify
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:docs
scripts.clean:docs: rimraf docs/*html docs/fonts docs/img docs/logo docs/scripts docs/styles
scripts.version: git commit -am 'Update version' && git add -f messageformat.*js* docs example/i18n.js
scripts.postversion: git reset --hard HEAD^ && npm run build:docs && git commit -am 'Update documentation'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean:all && npm test && npm run build:all
